title: Economic Impact of Disasters
description: This article details the financial costs associated with various disasters, highlighting how location and economic factors influence the estimated damages. It emphasizes that wealthy nations tend to report higher financial losses compared to poorer countries for similar events, with the Chernobyl disaster noted as the most expensive in history.
prompt: An informative diagram showing the cost of different disasters across the globe. Include key disasters like the 2004 Indian Ocean earthquake and tsunami, the Deepwater Horizon oil spill, and the Chernobyl disaster, represented by simplified icons. Use a clean, professional layout with clear labels for each disaster and their costs, incorporating a color scheme of blue and red to signify financial impact and urgency.
